channel.title: Donar problems
channel.description:
It takes up so much time for me to look through my paypal and give prem mems to people who donated .
is there anyway without using mysql to make it so that when you donate my paypal sends a email with a random command that gives u the things that u payed for.
and the command constantly changes like
1$ is prem, so i donate 1$ i recieve an email saying to type ::1donar, but then i tell my friend to type ::1donar but it doesnt work, and than someone else donates 1$ and they recieve email saying to type ::12odanr
do you get what im saying ? i hope you guys have any ideas o.o

item.title: Donar problems
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“reverce, post:8, topic:302013”]What you say is possible , A frend did it before , but it takes time and cash to hier a sommone who can do that for you , beside what your telling is a bad idea becous the randoom codes wil be pmed to other players and stuff and they wil cheat , I bet you don’t know how to make a code that only can be used once on server . if u can nicéé; becouse i cannot. I know somone who can build that for you but it wil be for payment and u will have to fix the command first 2
Pm me for further assitence.[/quote]

Just make it save to a .txt file the moment someone uses it? OR, make the command in the .txt file change randomly each time it is used. Not hard to do if you know how to program it.

Read full topic

item.title: Donar problems
item.dc:creator: @zane02 zane02
item.description:
@zane02 wrote:

I know whats going on… He has made it so that everytime someone donates he makes a command that makes them a donator for a certain amount of time. [a week, or a month, or a year whichever he has it say]. Anyway ao he changes it everytime someone donates, or he probly makes it so only a certain member can use it.

As if they made a starter command but only made it for 1 person. Then they make it so once you do it 1 time you cannot use it again. Its like that.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @WoodcutGuy WoodcutGuy
item.description:
@WoodcutGuy wrote:

Well, I have played a few private servers in my time, and what a lot of people do is they get a few WELL TRUSTED FRIENDS and share the paypal, and have those people on at different times and look at the cash amount, etc, but I am afraid I don’t think there is a way to do it that way, that you had explained.
